title: 'Fresh Air' Remembers Writer And Middle East Scholar Fouad Ajami
teaser: In 1988, Ajami spoke with Terry Gross about an essay he'd written about how political catastrophe came to Beruit, Lebanon, and how the city where he grew up became a land of cruelty and hatred.
